workflowSection.title: What Saras Automates for You
workflowSection.subtitle: From data ingestion to reporting, every step of your audit workflow is intelligently automated to minimize risk and maximize efficiency.

workflows.title: Trial Balance & Ledger Analysis
steps: Import trial balance and general ledger automatically or via upload
Map accounts using internal or industry templates
Identify unusual entries, duplicate postings, or classification errors

workflows.title: Anomaly Detection & Flagging
steps: Run 20+ prebuilt audit checks across financial statements
Spot mismatched balances, missing disclosures, negative values
Apply materiality thresholds to highlight critical issues

workflows.title: Segment & Function Analysis
steps: Extract payroll, GL, cost centers and map to business functions
Identify low-profit or loss-making functions for deeper audit

workflows.title: Compliance & Disclosure Review
steps: Verify completeness of Notes to Accounts as per GAAP or IND AS
Detect missing statutory disclosures based on audit checklist
Auto-flag outdated policy references or missing comparatives

workflows.title: Working Paper Generation
steps: Auto-generate audit working papers per module
Include exception details, reviewer comments, linked evidence
Maintain version history for peer or partner review
